scripts.build: npm run build:libs && npm run build:bricks && npm run build:templates && npm run build:micro-apps
scripts.build:libs: if [ -d libs ]; then lerna run build --scope "$npm-scope-of-libs$/*"; else echo "no libs"; fi
scripts.build:bricks: if [ -d bricks ]; then lerna run build --scope "$npm-scope-of-bricks$/*"; else echo "no bricks"; fi
scripts.build:templates: if [ -d templates ]; then lerna run build --scope "$npm-scope-of-templates$/*"; else echo "no templates"; fi
scripts.build:micro-apps: if [ -d micro-apps ]; then lerna run build --scope "$npm-scope-of-micro-apps$/*"; else echo "no micro-apps"; fi
